Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and value, it is worth $15000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12000. This is an excellent deal, as it represents a significant saving compared to its market value. I believe this price reflects the high-quality nature of the product while allowing us to share the benefits with you. I look forward to hearing your response. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
